channel.title: The Springfield Shopper
channel.description: Your daily source for local Springfield news, sports, and weather

item.title: Squirrel Resembling Abraham Lincoln Found
item.dc:creator: Ralph Wiggum
item.description: A local Springfield man has restored pride to Springfield by finding a squirrel that resembles Abraham Lincoln. Authorities are on the lookout for any rodents bearing resemblance to John Wilkes Booth.
item.content:encoded:
Full content of the article goes here.

Images and videos should be placed within the article copy.

item.title: Burns Pays City 3 Mil!
item.dc:creator: Todd Flanders
item.description: Wealthy resident Montgomery Burns was fined three million dollars after being caught dumping nuclear waste in the Springfield city park.
